casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

July 31, 2014

[Cite as 07/31/2014 Case Announcements, 2014-Ohio-3318.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

In re Johnson.

On February 6, 2014, this court found Cinseree Johnson to be a vexatious litigator under S.Ct.Prac.R. 4.03(B). This court further ordered that Johnson was prohibited from continuing or instituting legal proceedings in the court without obtaining leave. On July 21, 2014, Johnson presented a motion for leave to file a notice of appeal.

It is ordered by the court that the motion for leave to file is denied.
